text: I'm Meredith bear and I own a company
called Meredith bear and associates and
we're the largest aging company in the
world staging is taking generally an
empty house and filling it up with
everything that it takes to make the
house look really loved we charge
anywhere from ten thousand to one
hundred and fifty thousand dollars to
stage a home I used to be a screenwriter
and kind of a frustrated one and here I
get to sort of realize my fantasy so
I'll walk into a house and I'll think
mmm who lives here who's gonna buy it
and I get to kind of make up my
characters and decorate it for them I
might think oh this is an heiress who
just inherited a huge fortune her
family's always collected art and this
would be her Los Angeles home it has to
be really spectacular it has to look
like a home that someone will pay
anything for
most fun part of the business is once
you get all the furniture and everything
over there and you start pulling it
together it's just like if you just
imagine a kid that just got a new
dollhouse or something and everything is
new and you're putting it together it's
great the woman who's buying this house
she's an heiress
she's collects art that's her passion
and she loves to entertain and she loves
to have big dinner parties and she
spares no expense we have a hundred and
thirty houses installed right now we
have nine trucks we have seven crews we
also have a crew at the warehouse that
just manages the incoming inventory we
have our own workroom where we make
actually all of our upholstered
furniture we custom-made the sofas and
the shades in the corner because we
needed a very particular scale working
for Meredith is really great because
she's so creative and she's got such a
good eye for furniture and she's a mad
shopper so she's constantly buying
things for the the company and always
interesting pieces here antiques she
goes to you know estate sales over here
we have a whole new shipment of
chandeliers hanging up above you this is
our rug area over here and we have
hundreds and hundreds of thousands of
dollars in rugs I mean she's just
constantly purchasing them it's a really
important part of this staging so every
day is a surprise because you never know
what you're gonna find and it I come in
wow look at all this stuff
this is the master bedroom there was a
very beautiful rug here it was very old
and you can see all the dirt that was
coming out of it so the thing about
antique rugs is they carry a lot of
history with them and that was here
didn't look right it looked really
unimportant and small doing YouTube the
headboards do yeah yeah you know what
would be great then if someone could see
themselves going really contemporary
with this house that they could also see
themselves going sort of Japanese this
is a woman who likes to entertain so in
the bedroom she's gonna want to
entertain too so she might get to know
someone sitting on the couch in her
bedroom and then there's the bed this
had been a kind of a storage room but we
we feel that a house this important
needs to have a screening room
so the end of my character story is that
I get invited to her first party I don't
want it to look staged I want it to look
like someone just ran to answer the
phone they'll be right back
